Package org.ferris.tweial.console.email

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EmailAccount
    This class is a data model object representing email account data.
    EmailAnimatedGif  
    EmailDataSource
    The purpose of this class is to provide a small abstraction to how the application is to get email account data.
    EmailHandler
    This class contains the business logic for handling email related data.
    EmailPage
    This is the console view for email related information.
    EmailPropertiesFile
    This is a hard coded AbstractPropertiesFile object to "ConfigurationDirectory/email.properties"
    EmailRendererByFreeMarker  
    EmailSender  
    EmailSendEvent  
    EmailSendPriority  
    EmailStartupObserver
    This class is an event observer for email related actions.
    EmailTweet  
    EmailTweetBuilder  
    EmailVideo
